1.0.0.name: wordpress/tableofcontent
1.0.0.description:
This plugin is an easy way to add table of content to your post/page directly or as a widget. It will parser the content of your post/page for HTML headers and generate a list of links. This plugin will require some CSS understanding to match your site and the know how for adding custom fields in your post/page.

Features

  • Easy to style
  • Widget
  • Display table of content anywhere in your post/page content
  • Can set which html h1 to parse
  • Can set your own title

Plugin Page
